data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Exams are about to begin at our university. So ____ library ____ very ____ right ____. Students ____ there ____ in ____ day ____ spend ____ day ____ the ____ desk. It is hard to find a chair - or even somewhere to sit on the floor!
data.partBlankContent: Exams are about to begin at our university. So t__ library i_ very fu__ right n__. Students g__ there ea___ in t__ day a__ spend a__ day a_ the sa__ desk. It is hard to find a chair - or even somewhere to sit on the floor!
data.fullContent: Exams are about to begin at our university. So the library is very full right now. Students get there early in the day and spend all day at the same desk. It is hard to find a chair - or even somewhere to sit on the floor!
data.answer: 我们大学的考试就要开始了。所以现在图书馆已经满了。学生们每天很早到达那里，并且整天坐在同一张桌子前。很难找到一把椅子，甚至是可以坐在地板上的地方!
